content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Evaluator

content: Confirmed: You did not agree on a final price with Haoyu Wang.
name: Evaluator

content: Acknowledged. Moving on to the next question. How would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner on a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate Haoyu Wang as a 7 on a scale from 1 to 10.
name: Evaluator
